version_description:
Jack and Jill, went up the hill
To fetch a pail of water.
Jack fell down and broke his crown,
And Jill went home, watched some TV and dunzo'd the broken crown and the water in just a few taps, because finding stores is easier than ever now on dunzo!

* Dunzo partner rings the bell *
V: opens
D: Sir,could i see an id?
V: Behind this mask there is more than just flesh. Beneath this mask there is...
D: * sigh * if you could just show me the photo id
V: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me
D: * this is going to be a long day *
I have with me what you want to do. What you do will lift your 'spirits'
V: I want no trouble brewing. Just give it.
D: Thanks

All's well that ends well until the next order

Bats: Alfred, I’m in a pickle. I need you to update the dunzo app on my utility belt.
Alfie: Right away, sir. The application on your utility belt is getting updated.
Bats: And why can’t I reach Robin?
Bats: Alfred! I might lose an arm today! Robin’s ETA is about 5 mins.
Alfie: Sir, the new update might look a bit different, but the flow is great and it is going to be a snug fit.
Bats: Alfred!
Alfie: Yes, sir?
Bats: Can you ask Robin to get a few band-aids as well?
Alfie: Consider it done!

Cyclops: Prof Ex, we’re downsizing X-men. You’re Fired!
Xavier: What? You can’t fire me! How the hell will you find new mutants?
C: We have a new X on the team, dunzoX!
X: So will Magneto, Mr. Ray Ban. Wait, what do you mean X?
C: It’s the new dunzo subscription with limited invites!
X: Oh!
C: That’s 30 orders with priority allocation and exclusive support. And no delivery charges for first 3kms.
X: I call dibs on Jean Grey!
C: No you don’t.
X: I call dibs on the chair.
C: Sigh! They are already yours.

What if…
You woke up with a new face?
Would you do the same things all over?
Would you take the same road home?
Would you consider switching to skimmed milk?
Would you buy things or just dunzo it?
Would you love soap operas with the same ol’ melodrama?
Would you consider changing your bathroom etiquettes?
Would you find buoyancy a funny word to pronounce? (go on, try it!)

Would you?
We know we won't.
We’ve changed our home screen and we're still the same.
New home screen. A better dunzo experience.
-Bug fixes

Gurgaon, it’s ok to forget things now!

It’s ok if you are too busy to go shopping, and it’s ok if you forgot your laptop charger at home.
It's ok if your dog chewed it and now you need a new one. It's completely fine if you don't want to step out and still got something to buy.
We got you covered!

It’s ok to forget things now.
The only thing to remember is dunzo!

And there’s more, get on the app and we just might make your day with a few surprises and goodies.

Gurgaon, it's ok to forget things now!

It's ok if you are too busy to go shopping, and it's ok if you forgot your laptop charger at home.
It's ok if your dog chewed it and now you need a new one. It's completely fine if you don't want to step out and still got something to buy.
We got you covered!

It's ok to forget things now.
The only thing to remember is dunzo!

And there's more, get on the app and we just might make your day with a few surprises and goodies.

Download now to get Dunzo CASH reward of 50, redeemable on your first order.
Earn unlimited rewards by referring friends, and pay less for your next dunzo orders.

We also have unlimited free delivery for 3km on all orders placed on dunzo.

Get on the app today, rewards are waiting for you!

Love the List

We all love making lists.
A list of things to do.
A list of groceries to buy
A list of things you love to eat
A list of lists, so that you never forget

But when it comes to food, you can’t do without a list.
So we have listed out everything on the menu.

Lists can save the hungry. So go ahead and just Dunzo it!

The bugs we kill to bring on the thrill.

* New Signup Process - Smoother flow, the same awesome experience.
* What's trending - Know what's being Dunzo'd the most in your area
* Item confirmation - Even when you're far away, make your pick with just a click.
* A better way to track - Keep a tab on your partner wherever they may be, being a spy becomes that easy.

The Big Move

We’re always on the move for you.
Over the years, we have moved many things.
We helped you move hearts, save birthdays, weekends & anniversaries.
Your forgotten charger, PS4, late night food, your documents.

This time we are on the move to a new identity.
A brand new Dunzo. A better experience.
And your questions answered. You have FAQs now.

Dunzo knows your city like no other

We now know when your favourite stores open and when they shut. What's more, we are going to spoil you with more choices than you could ask for. With this update, we’ve cleaned up the bugs and improved our catalogue feature, as well as a faster home screen loading experience. New users - there’s more in your bag than you know, discounts are waiting for you. Download or update your app today!
All this with a new and bold identity.

No one will miss the dead bugs
Think of it as spring cleaning for tech. With this update, we have improved the backend of our app to give you a seamless, faster experience. Our engineers have worked hard to kill bugs to give you a reliable Dunzo experience, always. In other news, we are now live in Hyderabad and Delhi! So when you need something, just Dunzo it.

We are all new from the skin to bone

The prime focus behind this build was to create a version that was intuitive and predictable for users, merchants and partners alike. From a brand new landing page to the amicable shift to a white theme, the snazzy new version of the app is more than just looks. With improved live tracking, end to end ETAs, better UX and a new flow allow a seamless experience on the app. Get with the new and Dunzo on and on!

We are all new from the skin to bone

The prime focus behind this build was to create a version that was intuitive and predictable for users, merchants and partners alike. From a brand new landing page to the amicable shift to a white theme, the snazzy new version of the app is more than just looks. With improved live tracking, end to end ETAs, better UX and a new flow allow a seamless experience on the app. Get with the new and Dunzo on and on!

Small changes. Big leaps.

Now you can also pay using PayPal while availing great discounts. Referrals are back on popular demand so share the love and invite your friends. Got a prescription? Get your medicines delivered in a jiffy. You can search and order from any store in the city using Other Stores. Also, we've made a few changes on the homepage and payment page to enable a seamless ordering experience.

Keep the change

The past is just a touch away with the new update you can now access the previous orders right from the homepage. We have also made changes to the homepage and checkout page for a better experience on our platform. No one will miss the dead bugs- so we have roasted a few and made some under the hood improvements that will make the experience a lot smoother.

Are you Redmi for this update?

With this update, we have integrated the Mi Store to our list of categories on the home page. So now you can get your favourite Xiaomi phones and accessories delivered instantly at the tap of a button. We have also made finer changes that include bug fixes for a better experience on the platform.

It’s time for spring cleaning

We never let dust collect around our codes; we revisit them from time to time and make sure it works like a charm. So with this update, we have fixed the bugs that have been bothering you, have made a few upgrades that include changes to the referral page, Amazon Pay on Dunzo and a new list of popular stores near you on the home page. Consider your chores dun and dusted!

It’s time for spring cleaning

We never let dust collect around our codes; we revisit them from time to time and make sure it works like a charm. So with this update, we have fixed the bugs that have been bothering you, have made a few upgrades that include changes to the referral page, Amazon Pay on Dunzo and a new list of popular stores near you on the home page. Consider your chores dun and dusted!

Earn more with referral

Find and invite your friends who are not on Dunzo to earn upto Rs.100 Dunzo Cash. Get 50% Off upto Rs.100 on your orders with Dunzo Cash.



Coupon Codes

Apply Coupon codes and Get extra discounts on food, groceries, medicine, meat and more.



Faster Ordering

We have got the Dunzo speed to our ordering experience with improved UX. Several fixes under the hood to make the platform better.

A much faster Dunzo!

Track your partner even before he reaches the store
Better partner tracking and accurate ETAs.

No more confusion between your closeby addresses
Auto-detect closeby addresses and allow you to select while placing the order.

Kill that Bug
Multiple bug fixes so you can repeat orders like a Dunzo Ninja.

Now Dunzo Grocery, Food, Meat and Medicines much easier and faster.
24/7, 365-day delivery as always.

Have a nice pay!
With the latest update of the app, we have integrated Lazypay, which means you can make payments at your own convenience.

We’re routing for you!
We have also upgraded the live tracking feature , allowing better route mapping for your deliveries.

Easy pickings!
This version also contains modifications made to the Pickup & Drop category, that allows you to place your orders faster.

Kill that bug!
Other changes include bug fixes that improve your seamless experience on our platform.

No one will miss the dead bugs
Think of it as spring cleaning for tech.
With this update, we have improved the backend of our app to give you a seamless, faster experience. Our engineers have worked hard to kill bugs to give you a reliable Dunzo experience, always.

Order comes with a Freebie!
Order your daily essentials and add a free sample product to your cart, absolutely Free!

Ratings have arrived!
Now find ratings for all stores on Dunzo. Selection has never been easier.

Why select payment method?
With the preferred payment method, we put our AI to the rescue.
No need to select PayTm, GPay, Amazon Pay, Simpl or Credit/Debit cards every time.

Minor bug fixes.
We do that 24/7 but we thought we should let you know.

Leave no bugs behind!

Our engineers can be quite cold when it comes to bugs. So with this update, we have killed the bugs that have been bothering you. Other upgrades include changes to the backend of our app to give you a faster, seamless experience.

Flow is great when the tap is fixed.

With this update, enjoy a new and smooth experience while using Dunzo Assistant. Other changes include bug fixes to give you a faster and seamless experience.

Our engineers can be quite cold when it comes to bugs. So with this update, we have killed the bugs that have been bothering you. Other upgrades include changes to the backend of our app to give you a faster, seamless experience.

Always up for a chat

With this update, we have made huge upgrades to the Dunzo operator chat; this means you will get faster response and resolutions from our end for any queries related to your order. Other improvements include usability changes that enable seamless loading of the store page and a brand new image to replace the animation on the splash screen.

Cart me if you can!

With this release, we have made upgrades to the app that allows you to save your cart and place an order later. We have also revamped the address page and made it simple and easy to navigate. Other improvements include bug and crash fixes that improve your seamless experience on our platform.

Worry less. Dunzo More.

With this update, we have tweaked features that will improve your experience on Dunzo and meet your day-to-day orders with ease. Upgrades include bug fixes and changes to the backend of our app to give you a faster, seamless experience.

Worry less. Dunzo More.

With this update, we have tweaked features that will improve your experience on Dunzo and meet your day-to-day orders with ease. Upgrades include bug fixes and changes to the backend of our app to give you a faster, seamless experience.

Worry less. Dunzo More.

With this update, we have tweaked features that will improve your experience on Dunzo and meet your day-to-day orders with ease. Upgrades include bug fixes and changes to the backend of our app to give you a faster, seamless experience.

We’ll ring the bell and disappear!
Many of us have done this when we were kids, but of course, this is totally different.
With this update, we have worked on bettering the product to allow no contact delivery. Other improvements include bug fixes and backend changes that would allow us to deliver your orders seamlessly.
And don’t forget to pick-up your delivery before you close the door!

We’ll ring the bell and disappear!
Many of us have done this when we were kids, but of course, this is totally different.
With this update, we have worked on bettering the product to allow no contact delivery. Other improvements include bug fixes and backend changes that would allow us to deliver your orders seamlessly.
And don’t forget to pick-up your delivery before you close the door!

Gra-tip-tude is a positive change

We are immensely proud of our fleet, and they deserve more than our appreciation.

With this update, we are delighted to announce that our new tipping feature is now live on the app! Show some love to our delivery partners who are tirelessly working so that we can stay home. Other updates include bug fixes and backend changes to improve your experience on the app.

Gra-tip-tude is a positive change

We are immensely proud of our fleet, and they deserve more than our appreciation.

With this update, we are delighted to announce that our new tipping feature is now live on the app! Show some love to our delivery partners who are tirelessly working so that we can stay home. Other updates include bug fixes and backend changes to improve your experience on the app.

Gra-tip-tude is a positive change

We are immensely proud of our fleet, and they deserve more than our appreciation.

With this update, we are delighted to announce that our new tipping feature is now live on the app! Show some love to our delivery partners who are tirelessly working so that we can stay home. Other updates include bug fixes and backend changes to improve your experience on the app.

Congratulations! We will always find you a match!

Maybe you are looking for a respectable home-cooked bhindi masala, or maybe you are looking for a dependable AAA battery to charge your life, we will always make sure you find a match.



With this update, we have improved the product search feature on our app that allows you to find exactly what is missing in your life. Add the items to your cart real quick and checkout faster than before. We have also made improvements to Dunzo Cash and the referral feature, among other bug fixes and backend changes.

Judge me by my size, do you?

You must unlearn what you have learned about updates, for smaller in number they may be, but larger combined.

With this update, we have made numerous changes to some of the finer details in the background. Our code masters have spent hours to ease your experience on our platform with bug fixes and backend changes.

An OTP is a great pick-up line

With this update, we have introduced an option to assign an OTP to your order when you are sending packages via Dunzo. Users will be able to opt for a verification code that ensures your order is safely received at the other end- truly a courteous way to pick up your delivery.

Other upgrades include improvements to the payment feature and home page that enhances your experience on our platform, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

An OTP is a great pick-up line

With this update, we have introduced an option to assign an OTP to your order when you are sending packages via Dunzo. Users will be able to opt for a verification code that ensures your order is safely received at the other end- truly a courteous way to pick up your delivery.

Other upgrades include improvements to the payment feature and home page that enhances your experience on our platform, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

Yes, you can window shop with us!
Don’t we all like to look around before we make a purchase? So we thought why not bring that experience on our app too.

With this update, you can explore the app till checkout and only need to log in if you are raising an order. How can we make it better? Well, depending on the list of items in your cart, you will also get product recommendations during checkout.

Other upgrades include improvements to enhance your experience on our platform, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

Look what we have in store for you!

With this version of the app, we have made improvements to the store page that allow better discoverability for offers and other tweaks that include functional and aesthetic changes that enhance your experience while shopping on Dunzo. We have also refined the search feature on our app to provide a cohesive experience across the platform.

We’ve also made a few adjustments that would allow you to disable notifications and have upgraded our tipping feature, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

Look what we have in store for you!

With this version of the app, we have made improvements to the store page that allow better discoverability for offers and other tweaks that include functional and aesthetic changes that enhance your experience while shopping on Dunzo. We have also refined the search feature on our app to provide a cohesive experience across the platform.

We’ve also made a few adjustments that would allow you to disable notifications and have upgraded our tipping feature, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

One pay or the other

Now checkout faster than before with the latest version of the Dunzo app; with this update, we have included UPI payment method to help make your payments easier. This new version will also include tweaks to the search feature on the app, and will also carry crucial improvements to the store listing page.

Other upgrades include improvements to enhance your experience on our platform, among other backend changes and bug fixes.

Ab-Solution: Shake well before you update

Each 5ml of this update contains binary data that will rejuvenate your app and give it a refreshing glow, using a breakthrough formula.

Dosage: For electronic devices and software use only.

Lasting and radiant complexion for the app
Takes effect immediately
Recommended by 9 out of 10 developers

Contains a few ounces of bug fixes with no side effects and other updates that improve the health of your application.

Super Update Vs Day-Night Riders

What a match we have in our hands today, an update that seems to be in a fantastic form and an app that is in a formidable situation to win hearts yet again this season.
It's a great partnership we have here. This is a quick outfield and even quicker 1-click payment; what a clever drive through the gap to clear the boundary. He is going for the big one- and pulls a new store category page design with ease. What a brilliant way to end the match!

What a match we have in our hands today, an update that seems to be in a fantastic form and an app that is in a formidable situation to win hearts yet again this season.
It's a great partnership we have here. This is a quick outfield and even quicker 1-click payment; what a clever drive through the gap to clear the boundary. He is going for the big one- and pulls a new store category page design with ease. What a brilliant way to end the match!

Bug Wars: A New Hope

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. it was a period of unrest. Rebel updates were getting ready from their hidden base to attack the Bug Empire. During this attack, the rebel updates will also carry with them a plan to make the platform perform better than before. Now, it’s time for the rebels to make the home page go faster and restore the freedom to the galaxy.

Bug Wars: A New Hope

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away…. it was a period of unrest. Rebel updates were getting ready from their hidden base to attack the Bug Empire. During this attack, the rebel updates will also carry with them a plan to make the platform perform better than before. Now, it’s time for the rebels to make the home page go faster and restore the freedom to the galaxy.

Have yourself a merry little update

Let your app be light, from now on
Your payment troubles will be out of sight
Have yourself a merry little update
Make the flow tight & great
From now on your bugs will be miles away
Here we are better than olden days
Happy golden days at your door
Faithful codes who are dear to us
Gather near you once more
Through the orders, we will all be together
Every time the need arise
Hang 5 shining stars upon the App Store
And have yourself a merry little update now

Lokesh N - Our Hero

We have been working with him for years & he always knew where he wanted to be. In time, he improved & started guiding weary travellers who were lost and needed direction. He was not from the neighbourhood, but he knew the streets better than anyone. He was quick to read the signs & find a way to address the issue on the go; every day. No matter how difficult, he will arrive at a solution at the drop of a pin.

He's always up-to-date, and that's why our Lokesh N is always right.

Big Fat Indian De-Bugging

We request the honour of your presence at the union of our labour of love and her life-partner. Join us on this auspicious occasion and bless the couple.

Dunzo weds Bug-veer Hunter (Son of Bug-yavati & Fix-eshuvar)

The ceremony will begin right after uploading the files on to the internet.
Debugging & fixing to follow after the function.
Dress code: Buggy Pants & Suit
No gifts, please. Cash only.

Shikari Shampoo - With drama extracts

Are you still using your old update? The all-new Shikari Shampoo will add more drama while finding and tracking your partner. With rejuvenating animations that make you blush with delight, this update also contains goodness from developers that exfoliates the old & adds a natural glow.

Apply a coin-sized update gently after showering for drama.

Green D Flavour
Net Wt. 0.00 g

Moolah - Pay relief Spray

Does it hurt when you move your wallet at the end of the month? Does your account feel sore after severe swiping of the card? Well, with Moolah, you can last the month!

The active compounds in our spray will release you from the pain of paying right away. Now you can bend over backwards and make all purchases you need to make.

Spray it, and don’t pay it.

We hand credit where it belongs.

Payweather Vs Displayuiao - Update of the Century

For the thousands in attendance and millions updating at home- Ladies and Gentlemen, let’s get ready to rumble!
At the red corner, former undisputed lightweight update champion, the people’s champion- ‘Smooth-Pay’ Moneyshankar!
From the right, the newly promoted update, with more product images and details than ever before- Moredeep Display!

The bout is brought to you by ‘Sleepless Engineers’, in association with BugFixes.inc and Improvements.Ltd

Stay close to the router when updating

Nope, this update is not heavy.
In fact, it only contains things that you absolutely need- improvements that help you save money and the usual bug fixes without which our lives would be darn boring.

Do you know what else we absolutely need? A router with a short-range, so you don’t even think about leaving the house.

Don't take chances, stay in. Stay safe.

S3 E7: One with all the Fixing

Joey has sent Chandler to get him Orange juice (without pulp). A surprising new feature shows up to let Joey know that his juice is going to be delayed.

Back at the Museum, Ross is putting together a feedback form for his colleagues. Do they still like him after the ‘Sandwich Incident’?

Phoebe and Monica stumble on a bug problem at their apartment. A familiar set of codes return to save the day.

Pitch Perfect Update: The Final

It has been raining ideas for the past few weeks, but it all boils down to this last test here at Dunzo Bowl, where two of the best updates battle it out for the Championship. The Address Edit update comes to this match with a fantastic form and feature, while the Design update is definitely the favourite with a well-balanced side.

Needless to say, these squads of updates are well prepared & completely bug-free. So let’s join in for yet another day of update.

It’s coming home. For all time. Always.

It is our glorious purpose, to bring you everything you need and hence, it is paramount that we build a rainbow bridge between you and convenience.

So we have enhanced our visual magic with a touch of improved UI changes and learnt a few new spells that kill the big bug. No matter how low-key those changes are, they do impact everything.

Yes, we can bring you silverware, but not the one you’re expecting.

What makes a Gold-winning update?

Sheer passion & training to identify every item that goes out of stock before checkout, and let you know before the nick of time. We’ve also been flexing mental muscles to perfect our design, make it lean and convenient. A new and improved age verification process is a Herculean upgrade that helps us to be more compliant. What more? A healthy & balanced diet of bug fixes and other improvements that give you an Olympian update.
